# MTLBufferLayoutDescriptorArray

**Class**

An array of buffer layout descriptor objects.

## Declaration

```swift
class MTLBufferLayoutDescriptorArray
```

## Overview

An [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLBufferLayoutDescriptorArray] defines the data layout and loading for compute data, using [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLBufferLayoutDescriptor] instances.

## Array accessors

- **subscript(_:)**: Returns the state of the specified buffer layout.

## Configuring compute pass inputs

- **stageInputDescriptor**: The organization of input and output data for the next kernel call.
- **MTLAttributeDescriptor**: A descriptor of an argument’s format and where its data is in memory.
- **MTLAttributeDescriptorArray**: An array of attribute descriptor objects.
- **MTLBufferLayoutDescriptor**: A description of how a compute function fetches input data for an attribute.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
